required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Inflammation and Cell Maturation in Preterm Delivery Placentas - in Vitro and in Vivo Effect of Progesterone
clinical_study.official_title: Inflammation and Cell Maturation in Preterm Delivery Placentas - in Vitro and in Vivo Effect of Progesterone

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of this study is to investigate the In Vitro and In Vivo effect of progesterone on immature myeloid cells (IMC), inflammation characteristics and maturation into dendritic cells (DC).

primary_outcome.measure: Inflammation characteristic effects of progesterone on preterm and term placentas
primary_outcome.description: Differences observed in cytokine profiles of IMC cells from term and preterm placentas cultured with and without progesterone

primary_outcome.measure: Maturation effects of progesterone on preterm and term placentas
primary_outcome.description: Differences observed in maturation of IMC cells into DC cells in term and preterm placentas

arm_group.description: IMC cells taken from preterm labor placentas after delivery will be cultured with progesterone and will be analyzed for inflammation characteristics and maturation into DC cells.
IMC cells taken from term labor placentas after delivery will be cultured with progesterone and will be analyzed for inflammation characteristics and maturation into DC cells.
IMC cells taken from preterm labor placentas after delivery will be cultured without progesterone and will be analyzed for inflammation characteristics and maturation into DC cells.
IMC cells taken from term labor placentas after delivery will be cultured without progesterone and will be analyzed for inflammation characteristics and maturation into DC cells.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Term placentas from progesterone treated pregnancies
arm_group.description: IMC cells taken from term labor placentas from women that were treated with progesterone during pregnancy will be analyzed for inflammation characteristics and maturation into DC cells.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Preterm placentas from progesterone treated pregnancies
arm_group.description: IMC cells taken from preterm labor placentas from women that were treated with progesterone during pregnancy will be analyzed for inflammation characteristics and maturation into DC cells.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Term placentas not treated with progesterone in pregnancy
arm_group.description: IMC cells taken from term placentas from women who were not treated with progesterone during pregnancy will be analyzed for inflammation characteristics and maturation into DC cells.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Preterm placentas not treated with progesterone in pregnancy
arm_group.description: IMC cells taken from preterm placentas from women who were not treated with progesterone during pregnancy will be analyzed for inflammation characteristics and maturation into DC cells.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Term postpartum blood samples with progesterone
arm_group.description: CD-14+ monocyte cells taken from women delivering at term will be cultured with progesterone and will be analyzed for inflammation characteristics and maturation into DC cells.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Preterm postpartum blood samples with progesterone
arm_group.description: CD-14+ monocyte cells taken from women delivering preterm will be cultured with progesterone and will be analyzed for inflammation characteristics and maturation into DC cells.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Term postpartum blood samples without progesterone
arm_group.description: CD-14+ monocyte cells taken from women delivering at term will be cultured without progesterone and will be analyzed for inflammation characteristics and maturation into DC cells.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Preterm postpartum blood samples without progesterone
arm_group.description: CD-14+ monocyte cells taken from women delivering preterm will be cultured without progesterone and will be analyzed for inflammation characteristics and maturation into DC cells.

intervention.description: Progesterone, a steroid hormone will be cultured with placental IMC cells or peripheral blood CD14+ monocyte cells
intervention.arm_group_label: Term postpartum blood samples with progesterone
Preterm postpartum blood samples with progesterone

intervention.description: Culture of placental IMC cells or peripheral blood CD14+ monocyte cells without progesterone
intervention.arm_group_label: Term postpartum blood samples without progesterone
Preterm postpartum blood samples without progesterone

intervention.description: Culture of placental IMC cells with growth hormones only and analysis
intervention.arm_group_label: Term placentas from progesterone treated pregnancies
Preterm placentas from progesterone treated pregnancies
Term placentas not treated with progesterone in pregnancy
Preterm placentas not treated with progesterone in pregnancy

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Placentas from term and preterm deliveries
- Singleton pregnancy
- Consent to participate
Exclusion Criteria:
- Pregnancies with obstetric complications
- Multiple gestation
- Maternal illness or fetal malformation known pre-delivery
